title: Uniswap Trade
shortDescription: Trade 10 Uniswap tokens for the first time to earn UNI rewards!
longDescription:
### Perform these steps to earn your reward!  
1. Click the Enroll button below.  
2. Navigate to [Uniswap's trading site.](https://app.uniswap.org/#/swap)  
3. Trade 10 Uniswap  
4. Come back here and click Verify.  
5. You should see your reward in minutes!
